description:
Ticks, ewwww. Get them off quickly and non-invasively. This card has 2 removal tools and a magnifying glass to help ensure you get all of the tick.

  • 2 different sized tick removal tools for precise extraction
  • Magnifying lens to check for complete removal
  • Compact card size form factor fits well in wallets ensuring you always have the tool
name: LifeSystems Tick Remover Card
